name: cole-construction
author: C4 Tech and Design
description: A Cordova-based app for calculating the total cost of a concrete pouring job.

scripts.start: npm run prepare && npm run build
scripts.compile: npm run prepare && npm run build && npm run prepare-cordova && npm run cordova
scripts.recompile: npm run rebuild && npm run cordova
scripts.test: npm run serve && npm run mocha
scripts.quicktest: npm run server && npm run mocha
scripts.rebuild: npm run update && npm run build
scripts.start-over: npm run torch && npm run start
scripts.serve: npm run prepare && npm run build && npm run server
scripts.prepare: npm run prepare-node && npm run prepare-bower
scripts.prepare-all: npm run prepare && npm run prepare-cordova
scripts.prepare-cordova: cd build && cordova platform add android
scripts.update: npm run update-node && npm run update-bower
